title: Play lol in asian

embed.description: Website chính thức của Liên Minh Huyền Thoại Việt Nam. Liên Minh Huyền Thoại hiện là một trong những tựa game online hay nhất 2016 và được yêu thích nhất trên thế giới

body:
how can i play in this sever ? This is lol in Vietnam. how can i play lol in Vietnam while Im living in US right now. 
I tried to dowload vpngate.net to fake IP to vietnam location. But my ping it always 200 or 300. how can i get low ping on this sever. i want to play with my friend in vietnam. I saw from twitch a lot of people play sea sever they played like normal just 100 pings. 
Please help me with this.
My internet speed: 
Pings: 40 ms
Download speed: 60 mb
Upload: 10 mb

replies.body:
There are a *ton of factors* involved in what latency (ping) you'll see when connecting to a specific region or servers. Specifically, with the Vietnam League servers, there's simply a *ton of distance* geologically that will affect what you're seeing and 200 to 300 sounds pretty reasonable considering how far away you are from the servers.

Unfortunately, we cannot offer support for the Vietnam servers since Riot doesn't operate that servers, Garena does. I recommend reaching out to [**Garena's Support**](http://intl.garena.com/support/) for more information or assistance with this.
